short_summary: Parks Canada needs a supply of one Aviation Fuel Tank and Trailer.
description: The tank and hauling trailer will be used year round for fueling aviation equipment used during avalanche and fire scenarios.
full_summary:
# Aviation Fuel Tank and Trailer Tender

## Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: WS4402171977-Doc4413525035
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Solicitation ID**: WS4402171977
- **Publication Date**: February 5, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 5, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Date**: February 21, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 15, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 25, 2025

## Contract Details

- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Description

Parks Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to supply and deliver one Aviation Fuel Tank and Trailer. The tank and hauling trailer will be used year-round for fueling aviation equipment used during avalanche and fire scenarios. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will not be accepted and will result in declination as non-responsive. The supplier must deliver the tank and hauling trailer to 1 Compound Road, PO box 10, Jasper, Alberta, T0E 1E0.

## Contracting Entity

- **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
- **End User**: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
- **Contact Information**:
   - **Name**: Susi Kosmulalage (she/her)
   - **Email**: susi.kosmulalage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
   - **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18712415?extsite=MTg3MTI0MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note: 

* The tender closing date has been amended to March 5, 2024.
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on March 5, 2024.
* Late submissions will not be accepted
